Forward Indicators of Economic Cycles (Momentum of Flows)

CoT sector flow & momentum: economic cycle proxies.

As of 2025-10-14

Gemini Summary

State of the Market Summary:

  • The 'Other' sector currently shows a near-neutral average 4-week flow of -0.0104 as of 2025-10-14.
  • Approximately 46.01% of markets within this sector exhibit positive flows, balanced by 44.13% with negative flows.
  • Trend-confirming flows are notable at 39.44%, while contrarian flows remain relatively contained at 12.21%.

Technical Summary:

  • Flow momentum for the 'Other' sector registered a slight improvement this week, with `avg_flow_4w_mom` at 0.0083.
  • However, the average 4-week flow remains marginally negative, indicating a lack of strong directional conviction.
  • Current flow and crowding dynamics do not signal immediate high reversal or de-risking conditions.

References:

  • `Economic_Cycle_Proxies_Flow_Momentum` dataset, latest timestamp: 2025-10-14 00:00:00.
  • The `avg_flow_4w` and `avg_flow_4w_mom` metrics were most influential in these findings.
  • Additional granularity would benefit from direct Commitments of Traders (CoT) data for individual futures contracts.
  • Incorporating global macroeconomic indicators could further enrich future cyclical analysis.
